{"step_by_step_thinking": "The intrinsic and extrinsic pathways are both involved in the process of programmed cell death, or apoptosis. Necroptosis and necrosis are forms of cell death that are typically caused by injury or disease, not by an internal or external signal. Pyroptosis is a form of cell death that is typically caused by infection, not by an internal or external signal.", "answer_choice": "B. Apoptosis"}
